mention.text: the Shining Path guerrillas has threatened to kill a district attorney if he investigates charges that soldiers massacred dozens of peasants
members of Shining Path , a Maoist group
District Attorney Carlos Escobar on Monday
a farming village 40 miles south of Ayacucho
